verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy holy, holy Lord
holy holy Lord
God of Hosts. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Heaven and earth
are full of your glory. x2
Hosanna (hosanna) hosanna
Hosanna in the highest. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blessed who comes
in the name of the Lord. x2
Hosanna (hosanna) hosanna
Hosanna in the highest. x2
